long_description: An essential piece of protective equipment for high-altitude climbs, these Julbo Explorer glacier glasses offer exceptional protection for your eyes. Alti Spectron X4 polycarbonate lenses offer 100% UV protection and block 95% of visible light, reducing glare and creating a clear image. Mirror coating reduces glare. Lightweight, tough nylon frames feature a wrap-around design for enhanced grip and staying power. Vents are incorporated into the frame for increased airflow, resulting in less fogging. Gripping, bendable temples allow a snug, comfortable fit and the exclusive material won't stick to hair. Side shields block peripheral light for optimum coverage and protection; can be removed with a snap as needed. Adjustable neck cord attaches to temple ends and the unique clipping system lets it be removed quickly and easily as desired. Includes a zippered semi-hard shell case for secure storage in backpack or when traveling.
short_description: An essential piece of protective equipment for high-altitude climbs, these Julbo Explorer glacier glasses offer exceptional protection for your eyes.
